title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Tue Jan 2, 2018 | 7:16am EST Editors Choice Pictures 
People watch as fireworks explode over Copacabana beach during New Year celebrations in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. REUTERS/Lucas Landau Reuters / Sunday, December 31, 2017 People watch as fireworks explode over Copacabana beach during New Year celebrations in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. REUTERS/Lucas Landau Close 1 / 24 
A man gets ready backstage before performing in the 34th Cochin Carnival which is held annually to welcome the start of the New Year at Fort Kochi in the southern state of Kerala, India. REUTERS/Sivaram V Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 A man gets ready backstage before performing in the 34th Cochin Carnival which is held annually to welcome the start of the New Year at Fort Kochi in the southern state of Kerala, India. REUTERS/Sivaram V Close 2 / 24 
A young devotee grasps water while offering prayers on the bank of the Hanumante River during the Swasthani Brata Katha festival in Bhaktapur, Nepal. REUTERS/Navesh Chitrakar Reuters / Tuesday, January 02, 2018 A young devotee grasps water while offering prayers on the bank of the Hanumante River during the Swasthani Brata Katha festival in Bhaktapur, Nepal. REUTERS/Navesh Chitrakar Close 3 / 24 
The numbers "2018" are written in the air with a sparkler on a roadside while cars drive along the R257 "Yenisei" federal highway in the Siberian Taiga district outside Krasnoyarsk, Russia. Picture taken with long exposure. REUTERS/Ilya Naymushin Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 The numbers "2018" are written in the air with a sparkler on a roadside while cars drive along the R257 "Yenisei" federal highway in the Siberian Taiga district outside Krasnoyarsk, Russia. Picture taken with long exposure. REUTERS/Ilya Naymushin Close 4 / 24 
Activists of Ukrainian nationalist parties hold flares as they take part in a rally to mark the 109th anniversary of the birth of Stepan Bandera, one of the founders of the Organization of Ukrainian Nationalists (OUN), in Kiev, Ukraine.... more Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Activists of Ukrainian nationalist parties hold flares as they take part in a rally to mark the 109th anniversary of the birth of Stepan Bandera, one of the founders of the Organization of Ukrainian Nationalists (OUN), in Kiev, Ukraine. REUTERS/Valentyn Ogirenko Close 5 / 24 
Palestinian teen Ahed Tamimi (R) enters a military courtroom escorted by Israeli Prison Service personnel at Ofer Prison, near the West Bank city of Ramallah. REUTERS/Ammar Awad Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Palestinian teen Ahed Tamimi (R) enters a military courtroom escorted by Israeli Prison Service personnel at Ofer Prison, near the West Bank city of Ramallah. REUTERS/Ammar Awad Close 
A 'supermoon' full moon is seen rising in Pieta, Malta. REUTERS/Darrin Zammit Lupi Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 A 'supermoon' full moon is seen rising in Pieta,   7 / 24 
Burnt cars are seen in what remains of the multi-storey car park, where a large fire destroyed many cars on Sunday, in King's Dock, Liverpool, Britain. Merseyside Fire & Rescue Service/via REUTERS Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Burnt cars are seen in what remains of the multi-storey car park, where a large fire destroyed many cars on Sunday, in King's Dock, Liverpool, Britain. Merseyside Fire & Rescue Service/via REUTERS Close 8 / 24 
People wearing costumes participate in a traditional New Year's Day swim in Dunkirk, France. REUTERS/Pascal Rossignol Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 People wearing costumes participate in a traditional New Year's Day swim in Dunkirk, France. REUTERS/Pascal Rossignol Close 9 / 24 
A devotee lights a cigaret to a figure of Santa Muerte or The Saint of Death during the first prayer of the New Year at Tepito neighborhood in Mexico City. REUTERS/Daniel Becerril Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 A devotee lights a cigaret to a figure of Santa Muerte or The Saint of Death during the first prayer of the New Year at Tepito neighborhood in Mexico City. REUTERS/Daniel Becerril Close 10 / 24 
Members of a marching band take a break before performing during the New Year's Day parade in London, Britain. REUTERS/Simon Dawson Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Members of a marching band take a break before performing during the New Year's Day parade in London, Britain. REUTERS/Simon Dawson Close 11 / 24 
Fireworks are seen above the Taedong River during New Year celebrations as visitors pose for a photo in front of an ice sculpture of an intercontinental ballistic missile at the Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival in Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang,... more Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Fireworks are seen above the Taedong River during New Year celebrations as visitors pose for a photo in front of an ice sculpture of an intercontinental ballistic missile at the Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival in Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang, North Korea. Kyodo/via REUTERS Close 12 / 24 
Members of the Berliner Seehunde (Berlin Seals) ice swimmers club take a dip in lake Orankesee during their traditional New Year's swimming event in Berlin, Germany. REUTERS/Hannibal Hanschke Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Members of the Berliner Seehunde (Berlin Seals) ice swimmers club take a dip in lake Orankesee during their traditional New Year's swimming event in Berlin, Germany. REUTERS/Hannibal Hanschke Close 13 / 24 
A woman prays during a New Year's Day service inside a church in Ahmedabad, India. REUTERS/Amit Dave Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 A woman prays during a New Year's Day service inside a church in Ahmedabad, India. REUTERS/Amit Dave Close 14 / 24 
President Trump and first lady Melania Trump, with their son Barron, arrive for a New Year's Eve party at his Mar-a-Lago club in Palm Beach, Florida. REUTERS/Jonathan Ernst Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 President Trump and first lady Melania Trump, with their son Barron, arrive for a New Year's Eve party at his Mar-a-Lago club in Palm Beach, Florida. REUTERS/Jonathan Ernst Close 15 / 24 
Students react as water from earthen pitchers is poured on them to take a holy bath during a ceremony organised to resemble the annual month-long Hindu religious festival of Magh Mela, held during the Hindu month of Magh, in Ahmedabad, India.... more Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Students react as water from earthen pitchers is poured on them to take a holy bath during a ceremony organised to resemble the annual month-long Hindu religious festival of Magh Mela, held during the Hindu month of Magh, in Ahmedabad, India. REUTERS/Amit Dave Close 16 / 24 
Leicester City's Riyad Mahrez scores their first goal against Huddersfield Town. Action Images via Reuters/Andrew Boyers Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Leicester City's Riyad Mahrez scores their first goal against Huddersfield Town. Action Images via Reuters/Andrew Boyers Close 17 / 24 
Revelers brace freezing cold temperatures in Times Square ahead of New Year's celebrations in Manhattan. REUTERS/Darren Ornitz Reuters / Monday, January 01, 2018 Revelers brace freezing cold temperatures in Times Square ahead of New Year's celebrations in Manhattan. REUTERS/Darren Ornitz Close 18 / 24 
Fireworks explode over the towers of the St. Vitus Cathedral at Prague Castle to mar
